Source.Name: megatools
Source.Summary: Command line tools for accessing MEGA cloud storage
Source.Description: Megatools is a collection of programs for accessing Mega service from the command line. It allows you to copy individual files as well as entire directory trees to and from the cloud. You can also perform streaming downloads without needing to download the entire file.
